EmailTemplate.name: TS_WI_102012.Invitation - Don't Miss Out
EmailTemplate.subject: Don't Miss Out: Tech Seminar on Next Generation Public Safety
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Public Safety Technology Seminar:
Next Generation - Are You Ready? Wednesday, October 24, 2012 l Waukesha, WI
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
We hope that you will join us and fellow leaders in Public Safety where will discuss Next Generation 9-1-1 and introduce solutions to improve the workflow of your communications center.
- Unified user experience to interact with and incorporate new types of data such as text, pictures, video and more - Better integration of analysis and mapping with patrol work and fire response - Systems and network administration services - Improving connectivity with your wireless solution - Mobility solutions for rugged, reliable computing and evidentiary video - Streamline false alarm administration and increase fee and fine collections
Register here: http://offers.tritech.com/WI_NG911Seminar.html <http://offers.tritech.com/WI_NG911Seminar.html>
Hope to see you there!
Questions? Michelle McClellan TriTech Software Systems (858) 799-7900 info@tritech.com EVENT DETAILS Don't want to miss this informative technology seminar? See details below and register today. Date:
Wednesday, October 24
Time:
10:00 AM to 3:00 PM
Location:
Waukesha Microsoft Facility
N19 W24133 Riverwood Dr, Suite 150
Waukesha, WI 53188
Bonus:
Door Prizes, Refreshments and Lunch will be provided.
<http://offers.tritech.com/WI_NG911Seminar.html>
